Name: Cursed Crops
About the game: 'Welcome to the field, farmer! Play with up to three of your friends as the best combat farmers this side of the Mississippi, defending haunted farms from the evil animated vegetables they grow in the fields. Cleanse this curse by planting crops, but be ready to reap what you sow!' Cursed Crops is a local Co-Op* action tower defense game where players must defend their farm from hoards of evil vegetables. In order to cleanse the farmland of its evil curse, players must plant a variety of special crops. These crops will come back as fearsome foes so prepare by constructing defenses and purchasing upgrades! *(game requires controllers for local co-op)
